channel.title: Getting a server online?
channel.description:
Hello all.
I have been working on a Divine Pk RSC server for a while now. And im up to the stage of getting it online.
When it comes to shit like this i'm not too sure. If i'm correct using WAMP cannot get your server online .. across the internet.. only LAN right?
I have webhosting, and i have tried to follow the same instructions but with that.
But when trying to import demonik_lsd i get an error..
MySQL said: Documentation #1044 - Access denied for user 'w0944'@'localhost' to database 'demonik_lsd
after research i have found the error is due to me, not having root account access, therefore all databases i have must have a prefix of jakethefurious_com
thats the porblem.
I have literally no idea how to bypass this prefix, or use the prefix but alter the SQL script to use it.
If there is any alternate methods please let me know. (like if WAMP actually lets you have servers through the net)
Thanks alot in advance. I know you guys probably get really annoyed at the 'noobs' and their questions.
- Jake

item.title: Getting a server online?
item.description:
@1408 wrote:

Add me to msn. 7zftw@live.com i will attempt to help you.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting a server online?
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“jake1991, post:11, topic:234399”]Does the knowledge about private servers give a person a right to be a fucking dick and get away with it.
You’re all utterly fucked.

And you for sucking up his ass.

No one tried to help, you fucking idiot.

And he fucking flamed me first, do you lack the ability to read.

Fucking idiot’s.

Having knowledge about private server’s or what ever the fuck ever should not give someone the right to flame who they wish. If he did’t want to help me, thats fine. He didnt have to replyt with discouragement just becacuse hes a low life fucktard.

Fuck you ALL[/quote]Fuck you, you shouldn’t of asked for help. You’re not allowed to post help topics in this section, this section is for development only. Go back to rs2 you fucking idiot.
By the way.
Typing enter after every sentence makes you look cool.
Very cool.
So I’m going to just end this with a simple:
GTFO.

Read full topic

item.title: Getting a server online?
item.dc:creator: @bigh51 bigh51
item.description:
@bigh51 wrote:

[quote=“jake1991, post:6, topic:234399”]You are a low life faggot.

Putting people down to make yourself look better.

This isn’t junior high, and there are no girls watching.

Anyway
I’m working with my prefix, and everything is looking good so far…

(got the /www working, the database uploaded ect)

Its just i cant connect to my server… it is giving a few little errors when i start it up though…

[quote]onikp2p:
[java] [18:09:25 02-10-08] Server starting up…
[java] .\conf
[java] [18:09:25 02-10-08] Must specify port after ‘:’ in connection string

[java] [18:09:25 02-10-08] Connected to MySQL
[/quote]

[quote] [java] [18:09:28 02-10-08] com.rscd.packethandler.ProcessNameHandler
[java] [18:09:28 02-10-08] GameEngine now running
[java] java.lang.NullPointerException
[java] at com.rscd.Server.main(Server.java:59)[/quote]

and

[quote]
[java] [18:09:28 02-10-08] The server encountered an error while unfreezing
players
[/quote][/quote]Why are you flaming him when he knows 200x more about rsc private servers than you do? First you ask for help, then you flame people that are trying to help? You’re not getting any help from me, faggot.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @jake1991 jake1991
item.description:
@jake1991 wrote:

Hello all.

I have been working on a Divine Pk RSC server for a while now. And im up to the stage of getting it online.

When it comes to shit like this i’m not too sure. If i’m correct using WAMP cannot get your server online … across the internet… only LAN right?

But when trying to import demonik_lsd i get an error…

MySQL said: Documentation
#1044 - Access denied for user ‘w0944’@‘localhost’ to database 'demonik_lsd

after research i have found the error is due to me, not having root account access, therefore all databases i have must have a prefix of jakethefurious_com
